name: Candy Blaze - Shaman Jungle
description:
Candy Blaze - Shaman Jungle is a game where you will have to discover a treasure island full of hidden objects and pristine places.The game focuses on a lost world within the maya temples.It brings the player back into time to find the lost treasures of the island.The candies have a curse on them and they transformed into marbles and other diamonds and gold.Collect all the points,stars and diamonds and boost your game with power-ups that will help you throughout the game.This surrealism of jewel sweets will make your heart beat and you will feel the blitz of the jungle labyrinth!Squeeze the juice out of this tangled forest plus get some big combos!Smash the crazy demon and the candy skull that are after the diamonds in the amazonian wasteland.

Features:
• Ancient and stony candies, your little kids will love playing with the marbles and will blow their minds with awesome game effects!
• Over 125+ breath taking levels
• Lots of game goals, move mode, time mode, collect ingredients mode, etc.
• Surreal graphics, you will want to smash the talisman,maya and runes in the game!
• Do your best, get the highest score!
• Match colors in your free time and relax playing a super puzzle game!
• Stay away from the curses of the game and other traps that the game hides!

How to play

- Match and crush 3 candy stones or more to gain new points
- Crush 4 candy runes in a line to create a special bonus which sends waves of lightning!
- Crush 5 candy crystal in a line to create a multi-color blossom bomb which explodes other pebbles in the game when combined and bursts lightning thunder bolts
- Combine 2 special bonbon to blaze a big part of the pebbles!
- Enjoy this Totem Saga and become a master of the jewels!
- You will find incredible surrealism in the game!
